body:
@H_san I think you meant "177013 ".
But the game isn't really that bad, since you have multiple endings, meaning that you can avoid the "bad" ending. Of course, you can go full ntr if you want.
Anyway, even the "best" route has its "ups and downs", and the swinging is unavoidable, since this is the main theme of the story, so, it will feel like ntr sometimes, for both couples...
Also, this story is almost exactly to the "good route" you can take in the game, but after the swapping, the author tried a somewhat "original" route using different scenes from the game, but with completely different context.

The thing is, this is based on the game, but this is basically some kind of "original" ending, although it actually uses some "scenes" from the game, also, it's using some scenes from the game, but with a different context, especially the end scene...
Just keep in mind that the games has various endings, all are bad/ntr ending but one, which is the happy/swapping ending. I recommend playing the game if you can, just dont expect some kind of "chad ending".

pt2: After the soft swap happens, FMC loved it but wasn't enough, she ask for them to do a full swap, MC again "doesn't like" it but accept it, I say "doesn't like", because at this point, the FMC notices that the MC actually got very hard and cum when he saw her playing with another man's dick. But its not enough, so, she goes to glasses guy again, the end...

Well, after that, she has de idea/desire to go a soft swap, the MC "doesn't like" it, but since, like you said, he's afraid of losing her, he accepts it.
